item.title: Re-nourish: Design Sustainably
iYo YoYo Charger for iPhone
item.description: Peter Thuvander’s concept for a YoYo powered battery charger for USB devices like the iPhone is brilliant. I’m a big fan of efforts to provide clever alternative energy sources from human-powered generators. Via Core77, yo. http://www.peterthuvander.se/
